explanation: [0-0] On the right side of the frame, a shirtless man in red shorts is standing in the water, facing left. He has his hands clasped in front of him. There are other people in the water around him. There is a yellow object to the left and green trees in the distance.

[0-3] Then the man in red shorts swings his right arm forward, the picture slows down, and splashes of water slowly splash up on the surface of the water. A blue and white ball flies from left to right, hitting the splashing water, and then falls.

[3-8] Immediately following, the scene switches to a tattooed, bearded man who is all smiles as he looks ahead. Then, he speaks and sways his body. Behind him are tall, green trees. There is a pink mat to his left. Then the picture switches, the bearded man is facing left and standing in the water. Afterward, the picture slows down. The bearded man waves his right hand in the water, and splashes of water slowly splash up on the surface of the water. At the same time, a ball flies quickly from left to right, hitting the bearded man on the forehead. The bearded man falls to the right into the water. Two children are sitting on the steps to the right, watching happily.
